Token.Abstract: @brief The animating state of the activity indicator view. @details If you get this value, it redirects to [-isAnimating:][1] If you set this value YES, it redirects to [-startAnimating:][2] if you set this value NO, it redirects to [-stopAnimating:][3] [1]: http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/uikit/reference/UIActivityIndicatorViewClass/Reference/UIActivityIndicatorView.html#//appleref/occ/instm/UIActivityIndicatorView/isAnimating [2]: http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/uikit/reference/UIActivityIndicatorViewClass/Reference/UIActivityIndicatorView.html#//appleref/occ/instm/UIActivityIndicatorView/startAnimating [3]: http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/uikit/reference/UIActivityIndicatorViewClass/Reference/UIActivityIndicatorView.html#//appleref/occ/instm/UIActivityIndicatorView/stopAnimating

@brief The animating state of the activity indicator view. @details If you get this value, it redirects to [-isAnimating:][1] If you set this value YES, it redirects to [-startAnimating:][2] if you set this value NO, it redirects to [-stopAnimating:][3] [1]: http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/uikit/reference/UIActivityIndicatorViewClass/Reference/UIActivityIndicatorView.html#//appleref/occ/instm/UIActivityIndicatorView/isAnimating [2]: http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/uikit/reference/UIActivityIndicatorViewClass/Reference/UIActivityIndicatorView.html#//appleref/occ/instm/UIActivityIndicatorView/startAnimating [3]: http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/uikit/reference/UIActivityIndicatorViewClass/Reference/UIActivityIndicatorView.html#//appleref/occ/instm/UIActivityIndicatorView/stopAnimating
